ComicInfo.Title: Here's Negan!: Chapter 5
ComicInfo.Summary:
IMAGE+ is a monthly magazine featuring Image's upcoming releases, as well as bonus creator-owned comics content. Each issue features an original, four-page THE WALKING DEAD story concerning Negan's origins, and created by New York Times bestselling team ROBERT KIRKMAN and CHARLIE ADLARD, for a total of 48 pages of backstory! IMAGE+ showcases interviews, spotlight features, bonus never-before-seen preview pages, editorials from industry voices, and more in-depth, insightful and provocative comics coverage curated by David Brothers, Branding Manager at Image Comics. IMAGE+ is fans' premiere source for all things creator-owned.
*Table of Contents* Front cover: A.D. After Death Comic Lovers (IFC) - Story & Art: Brandon Graham Letter From the Publisher: Appreciate the Small Things - Foreward by David Brothers Jeff Lemire & Scott Snyder: Death is dead, what comes next?* A.D. After Death: Book 1 (of 3) - Story: Scott Snyder / Art & Colors: Jeff Lemire Frank Barbiere, Victor Santos, & Dylan Todd: Live fast and die young, but make your enemies die first.* Violent Love #1 - Story: Frank Barbiere / Art: Victor Santos / Design: Dylan Todd Industry Perspectives: Ed Brubaker: Comics has come a long way, baby! Jonathan Hickman: The comics mastermind welcomes you to a new frontier.* Frontier #1 - Story/Art: Jonathan Hickman Comics Uncovered: Check out a few of our 2016 Eisner Award winners! - Article by Sam Stone Invincible - Centerfold artwork by Ryan Ottley & Dave McCaig Alex de Campi & Tony Parker: Get the straight dope on illicit espionage comix.* Mayday #1 - Story: Alex de Campi / Art: Tony Parker / Colors: Blond Shop Spotlight: Cosmic Monkey Comics (Portland, OR) Kurtis Wiebe & Tyler Jenkins: It's the beginning of the end for the World War II epic.* Street Angel - Story: Jim Rugg & Brian Maruca / Art: Jim Rugg The Walking Dead: Here's Negan!, Chapter 5 - Story: Robert Kirkman / Art: Charlie Adlard / Gray Tones: Cliff Rathburn / Letterer: Rus Wooton / Editor: Sean Mackiewicz Image Comics November Checklist / Order Form Back cover: Frontier #1 Note: Titles in bold letters denote original content. Titles in bold and italic letters denote exclusive previews and first looks. Asterisks denote interviews. Everything else are articles unless otherwise noted.
